ai-tha-ap94:1.1_0: “For he who has no longer relation to the world,
ai-tha-ap94:1.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap94:1.4_0: from the Buddha, Kinsman of the Sun,
ai-tha-ap94:2.1_0: in the place where the departure is not allowable.
ai-tha-ap94:2.2_0: The King gave the big to the Great Chief (all),
ai-tha-ap94:3.1_0: The Lord of the Buddha, having given a prosperity to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap94:4.1_0: On the two eons have passed,
ai-tha-ap94:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap94:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Susīma.
ai-tha-ap94:8.1_0: Seeing the second of the Elder Subhadda
